channel.title: Attack Option
channel.description: So in my server, if you walk in and out of the wildy, you will permanently have the option to "attack" any player, but obviously it will tell you they're not in the wildy. How can I fix this to where you don't have the option to attack them when you're outside the wildy?

item.title: Attack Option
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

if(!inWild()) { sendOption(3, 0, null, 1); }

that should fix it

or do what the above user said and replace !inWild() with safezone()

Read full topic

item.title: Attack Option
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:


You need to make sure everything else except the wilderness is a safezone

You need to make sure everything else except the wilderness is a safezone

Read full topic

item.title: Attack Option
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

So in my server, if you walk in and out of the wildy, you will permanently have the option to “attack” any player, but obviously it will tell you they’re not in the wildy. How can I fix this to where you don’t have the option to attack them when you’re outside the wildy?
